PixelToaster Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
DisplayProvides the mechanism for getting your pixels up on the screen
FloatingPointPixelRepresents a pixel in floating point color mode
KeyIdentifies a single key on the keyboard
ListenerImplement the listener interface and register with a display to receive events
ModeLets you chose between floating point and truecolor when you open a display
MouseDescribes the current mouse position and the state of the left, right and middle mouse buttons
Mouse::ButtonsIndicates which mouse buttons are currently being pressed
OutputLets you chose between fullscreen and windowed when opening a display
TimerA high resolution timer
TrueColorPixelRepresents a pixel in truecolor mode
